currencyChoice.tooltip.message: Click to use {ThisCurrencySymbol} as the default currency symbol in examples.
currencyChoice.tooltip.description: When hovering over the currency symbols in the navbar, this tooltip is shown.

explanation.budgetBars.tooltipBudget.description: When hovering over a budget bar on the explanation page, a tooltip shows the voter's budget and spending. This is the label before the budget amount.

explanation.budgetBars.tooltipSpending.description: When hovering over a budget bar on the explanation page, a tooltip shows the voter's budget and spending. This is the label before the spending amount.

sankey.tooltipBudgetShare.description: used in tooltips of voters in the Sankey diagram to say 'Budget share: [amount]'

sankey.tooltipContributesAmount.description: used in tooltips of voters in the Sankey diagram to say that a voter contributes amount to a project

sankey.projectTooltip.message: Project {projectNumber} costs {projectCost}. This cost is covered equally by the {numVoters} voters who voted for Project {projectNumber}. Each of these voters contribute {contributionAmount} from their budget share.
sankey.projectTooltip.description: The tooltip appearing when hovering over a project on the right

sankey.cityTooltip.message: A közösségi költségvetés összege {cityBudget}. It is divided equally between the 8 voters, so each voter gets {voterBudget}.

sankey.cityLabel.description: Label for the City on the left of the Sankey figure

sankey.projectLabel.leftTextLine1.message: Step 1: The budget is divided equally

sankey.projectLabel.rightTextLine1.message: Step 2: Projects are funded with the shares

sankey.projectLabel.rightTextLine2.message: of those who voted for them
